DESCRIPTION: Journey through the fourth dimension with Beats in 4D—a mind-bending fractal visualization that slices through impossible geometry. Glowing orbs and luminous beams radiate from a brilliant core, creating an explosive network of light that shifts between warm golden yellows and cool electric blues. The entire structure rotates through multiple dimensional planes simultaneously, revealing cross-sections of 4D space that would be invisible in our three-dimensional world. Audio-reactive pulses make every bass hit intensify the flash and warp the dimensional fabric with sine distortions. Perfect for progressive house, trance, and experimental electronic music where mathematical beauty meets pure energy.
